greetings.name: Friend
greetings.message: May your holidays be filled with warmth, joy, and all the magic of the season. Wishing you a wonderful Christmas and a Happy New Year!

greetings.name: Sarah
greetings.message: Sending you love and warm wishes this Christmas. May your days be merry and bright, and may the new year bring you endless happiness!

greetings.name: Mom & Dad
greetings.message: Thank you for all the love and joy you've given me. Wishing you the most magical Christmas filled with laughter and cherished moments together.
